right.item:
Indications

A methionine, threonine, and valine free and isoleucine low protein substitute for use in the dietary management of Methylmalonic Acidaemia (MMA) and Propionic Acidaemia (PA) in individuals aged 8 years and older.

Product Features

  • Methionine, threonine, valine free
  • Low isoleucine content
  • Low volume
  • Contains the necessary mixture of amino acids, carbohydrates, minerals, trace elements and vitamins to meet the daily nutritional needs of this age group
  • Provides 60g of protein equivalent per 100g of powder
  • Unflavored powder with separate FlavourPac sachets available

Nutritional Information & Ingredients

Available at the end of this page.

Dosage and Administration

  • Dosage of MMA/PA express should be determined by the clinician or dietitian
  • The daily protein requirement is given as MMA/PA express (100g is equivalent to 60g of protein).
  • Additional protein is provided from natural protein sources in medically prescribed quantities to provide methionine, threonine, valine and isoleucine in controlled amounts, which is essential for normal development.
  • Foods high in carbohydrate and fat but low in protein should be provided as an energy source to supply the remainder of daily calories.

Guidelines for Preparation and Use

  1. Empty the contents of a sachet into a beaker (provided), and add a FlavourPac sachet if desired. Add cold water to about half way up the beaker (approximately 80ml).  Secure the lid and shake for 10 seconds.  Serve and drink immediately.
  2. Water or permitted drinks should be taken after the MMA/PA express. 
  3. Cover and refrigerate any unused formula.  Use prepared formula within 24 hours.  Shake well before serving.

Storage

Store unopened sachets at room temperature.  After opening, store tightly sealed sachet in a cool, dry place and use within one month.  Avoid storing product in areas of extreme temperatures.

Availability
Product Number Description Packaging NDC Format Code
054371 MMA PA express unflavored 30 x 25g sachets 50600-0543-71
